comments.author: hugeblack
comments.body: It expresses the opinions of the participants, but trading is greater than feelings, as there are trading bots that can be programmed with zero feelings, and yet they may fail to achieve a profit compared to trading with feelings. Feelings are nothing but a motive. If you exploit them well, they will lead you to profit, and if you misuse them, they will lead you to loss. Otherwise, Greed, greed, and the desire to have more money and less work is why we all invested in Bitcoin, but some put limits on these feelings so that they do not believe scammers who tell them that they can double their money within 24 hours. However, they are more courageous than those who want a guaranteed profit with zero risks.the most correct sentence is to learn how to control emotionsÂ  and exploit them to maximize profit, and not just put them aside when trading.
